content.description: Indigenous Tourism Manitoba exists to support the Indigenous tourism industry in Manitoba by providing leadership, sharing of stories, and providing the support to strengthen the Indigenous tourism economy in Manitoba. ITM aligns with the mandates of Travel Manitoba and the national Indigenous Tourism Association of Canada (ITAC). Indigenous Tourism Manitobaâ€™s Business Plan summarizes its organizational structure, goals, successes to date, state of the industry, future potential, and revenue generating initiatives. Action plans are focused on Leadership & Collaboration, Experience Development, and Marketing & Organizational Development.
content.heading: Who We Are

pageProps.description: Nestled deep in the heart of Manitoba, our aboriginal tourism company invites you on a journey of discovery and wonder. Immerse yourself in the traditions and culture of our indigenous communities, as you explore the breathtaking beauty of our pristine wilderness. Our experiences are designed to take you on a transformational journey, where you'll learn about the ancient customs, legends and stories of our ancestors, and connect with the land and its people in a way that you've never experienced before. From cultural immersion programs and wildlife safaris to traditional storytelling and dance, our offerings are as diverse as our people. So come, join us on a journey of adventure, culture and tradition, and discover the true soul of Manitoba's aboriginal heritage.
pageProps.title: Indigenous Tourism Manitoba
